Identification.LongTitle: Prescribed Entities and Classes of Mortgages and Hypothecs Regulations

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 10(3)a of the Interest Actb, hereby makes the annexed Prescribed Entities and Classes of Mortgages and Hypothecs Regulations.

Section.Text: For the purposes of paragraph 10(2)(b) of the Interest Act,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: trusts settled for business or commercial purposes,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: unlimited liability corporations as defined in the Business Corporations Act, R.S.A. 2000, c. B-9,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: unlimited liability companies as defined in the Business Corporations Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 57, and

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: unlimited companies as defined in the Companies Act, R.S.N.S. 1989, c. 81; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the prescribed class of mortgages and hypothecs consists of those issued after January 1, 2012.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on January 1, 2012.
